reviews.review: ya prolly playing this for the context or more likely trying to play a multiplayer game with that one friend you haven't talked to in 10 years.

Dude just get it.
Stop looking for reasons not to.
You are legally obligated to own Portal 1&2.
Es de mis juegos favoritos, la historia es muy interesante y la jugabilidad muy comoda :D
Still love it to this day, worth my money

I really want to like this game, I love the story, humor and characters it's just that the gameplay is shit. The beginning is fun, but then you drop down a hole and then there is a drop in quality. I don't want to look in every minuscule fucking corner to progress. This game really made me not want to play video games any more, I had to take a week long break before I could even think about playing another game again, would not recommend.
One of the best games ever made please for the love of god Portal 3 I'm on my knees Valve
Played it on PS3 a long time ago and loved it, still love it to this day.
Dinamiche simili al primo capitolo della saga con un'unica differenza: c'è anche la modalità coop <3
Um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei...
Imposible no darle una reseña positiva a este juegazo. Si no lo tenés todavía, compralo YA :)
This game is a must for those who have finished the first Portal game. Clever and addictive.
An amazing experience the story is fantastic,musics are pretty much climatic,the graphics are amazing for a 2012 game,one of the best puzzle game ever and i love it.Definetely recommend.
Очень крутая и интересная игра!!!Геймплей интересный и не скучный!
Gra logiczna, dzięki której możemy wysilić troszkę mózg. Długi czas wstecz przeszłam u kogos obydwie części. U siebie zrobie to chętnie jeszcze raz :) polecam

wheatley alone makes this game absolutely amazing glados and cave johnson are funny as well

one of my favorite games of all time please buy this as soon as possible

5 companion cubes out of 5
one of the best games i have ever played
one of my first source games

This game is great if you want a break from shooters. The puzzles are hard, but not near impossible, theyre the perfect difficulty. The game has a great story, even if you didn't play portal one. I strongly recommend this product.
This is just fantastic 13/10 am gonna play again

Diese Spiel hier ist eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe die Fortsetzung zu portal 1 wurde perfekt weiter gemacht leider wird es net weiter geführt aber trotzdem ein sehr gutes und gelungenes Spiel! Emphelenswert!
amzing game would recomend got it as a gift to my freind as well 10/10

awesome.
coop mode is even awesomer

Great game if a little too long for the concept as after the novelty of the gun were's off you realise you 6 hours + more of puzzles whose only intention is to stop you from getting to the end which is ultimately your objective. Because of this the puzzle which should be enjoyable start to feel more like roadblocks. 

The overall experience though is very satisfying.
muito bom, passei horas jogando, jogo muito viciante, recomendo que compre, mas compre quando estiver em promoção, ou black friday
The best CO-OP game in the world. [h1]10/10[/h1]
muy buen juego, con buenos puzzles, viva el odio por wheatly

puzzles mais complexos que o 1, também muito divertido de jogar multiplayer
Eins der besten Spiele, die ich je gespielt habe. Es ist nicht umsonst ein Klassiker
I wanted sequel to Portal and this had done the job well!
The game is great. it really gets your brain working and the Co-Op is so much fun!

Хорошая игра. Советую
This game is really fun I highly recommend!
Jedna z najlepszych gier w które grałem!

Quase uma década e ainda e mais de 40 horas de jogo, e ainda não repeti nenhuma fase boa do jogo, a melhor parte desse jogo é que a comunidade pode deixar ele vivo. Tanto jogando sozinho como com algum amigo esse jogo vai ser muito bom, com amigo vocês podem pensar juntos em como resolver os problemas, e sozinho geralmente os desafios são ainda mais dificieis de fazer. Eu recomendo muito esse jogo, e se você esta comprando depois de 2020 e ta com medo de não ter mais muito conteudo no jogo, eu te garanto que tem, e o jogo não deve parar de crescer por um bom tempo, e mesmo se parar de crescer, você ainda tem uma década de mapas criados por outros jogadores. É o jogo perfeito pra jogar com um amigo, ambos são muito uteis no desafio, e não apenas uma arma pra dar mais dano como na maioria dos jogos co op

Este jogo para mim é perfeito. Tem tudo que um jogo precisa, ele tem história legal, trilhinha maneira, puta visu, e uma estranheza mto massa, o robô amigo deixa a parada sinistra demais, ele é ácido e esquisito e sinceramente assustador. Jogando de novo mas é como se fosse a primeira vez, escrevo mais depois
Its a game that you can play
